content.rendered:
Directed by Amar Kaushik

Written by Krishna D.K.. Sumit Arora. Pawan Sony

Cast Ashish Chhipa (A.C. Vastav). Rajkummar Rao (Vicky). Shraddha Kapoor (Unnamed Woman). Pankaj Tripathi (Rudra). Aparshakti Khurana (Bittu). Abhishek Banerjee (Janna). Ram Kishan Dhakad (Tailor’s Asst.). Atul Srivastava (Vicky’s Father). Vijay Raaz (Shastri). Aakash Dabhade (Narendra). Nora Fatehi (Item girl in ‘Kamariya’ song). Kriti Sanon (Dancer- Song ‘Aao Kabhi Haveli Pe’). Flora Saini (Stree) . Backagaindancer (Saurabh). Joy Badlani (Bittu’s Father). Viren Basoya (Prakash). Arvind Bilgaiyan (Janna’s Father). Badri Chavan (Vicky’s Friend). Kapil Hanwat (Friend). Mushtaq Khan (Aam Sabha Party leader). Shaukeen Khan (Friend). Atmaja Pandey (Friendship-wali). Abhishek Singh Rajput (Jana’s Friend). Bhupendra Rajput (Man In Bittu’s Store). Sunita Rajwar (Janna’s Mother). Bajpai Sharad (Friend). Harsh Shashwat (Digital partner). R.N. Shukla (Watchman). Abhinay Raj Singh (Village boy Ranveer). Deependra Singh (Perpendikular)

Language Hindi

Producers Syed Zaid Ali. Zohaib Ali. Krishna D.K.. Varun Mehra. Sanjeev Mishra. Raj Nidimoru. Santosh Rai. Shilpan Vyas Tinu. Dinesh Vijan. Pooja Vijan

Production D2R Film. Maddock Film. Skywalk Film
